EmailTemplate.name: 2020BK-03 MST 67A Transponder Upgrade EXTERNAL.2020BK-03 MST 67A Transponder Upg
EmailTemplate.subject: 2020 BendixKing Sales Bulletin Updates and Discounts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | February 2020 Thank you for being a valued customer. Here are this week's sales bulletins:
AeroCruze 230 Autopilot BendixKing is excited to announce pricing and ordering guidance for the AeroCruze 230 (KFC 230) flight control system (autopilot), with Dealer Bulletin 2020BK-02 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020BK-02 AeroCruze 230 Autopilot.pdf]]>.
MST 67A Transponder Upgrade BendixKing is pleased to offer the MST 70B Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast Out (ADS-B Out) transponder, with Dealer Bulletin 2020BK-03 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2020BK-03 MST 67A Transponder Upgrade.pdf]]>.
The complete list of 2020 sales bulletins is available at aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/downloads/sales-bulletins]]>. Dealers must log in to view these bulletins.
Find your nearest BendixKing Area Sales Manager by visiting our website: https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team <[[https://www.bendixking.com/en/sales-team]]>.
Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
